html:
3.21.19  8:38 pm   So bill it's been a few days since might quit.  How are you currently feeling about the schedule for this round?  

      I believe in you man!!!
3.21.19  8:12 pm   if you were Santa, would you legally change your name to Santa Claus or just keep the name you have now (Bill Wurtz, in case you forgot)?

3.21.19  8:00 pm   your advice when trying to learn how to do stuff is to make a lot of very small things to improve your skills. and this works for me for videos and for programming. but this absolutely does not work for me for music. every time i try to make a song that's less than 1:30

      i am overcome with feelings of uselessness and suck. really i can only think of one song i like that is shorter than a minute, and that is an album intro song and probably should have been longer than a minute too.

      pretty much every idea i have for a (lyrical) song either sucks or begs to be in the 1:30-3:30 range. so i keep making medium length songs (~3 minutes) and my skills are very mediocre so they all take a long time and come out mediocre. i would like to improve much faster but do not want to make short things (or make things short) just to get them done. are there any alternative solutions to this
3.21.19  7:55 pm   when do you know that you are friends with someone
3.21.19  7:01 pm   What made life possible?
3.21.19  6:17 pm   My girlfriend and I are going to be celebrating our one-year anniversary soon. What should we do to celebrate?

3.21.19  6:07 pm   favorite Key & Peele moment? if you have multiple favorites, feel free to list them all.  

this

3.21.19  4:44 pm   are you taking a a break right now?

      if not, will you please take a break? you sound really burnt out after "might quit." great job by the way

3.21.19  4:30 pm   Do you include the stuff you do to spread the Good Word of bill wurtz in your biweekly goals?

      You talk about travel, interviews, live stuff like they're a distraction from the Real Work.

      But it all results in transmitting your epic ideas into more people's minds. Do you think of all the promotional stuff as distraction? or another part of the process?
3.21.19  4:09 pm   how to relieve stress?
3.21.19  4:02 pm   What's the best way to get out of a creative, spiritual, and physical rut?
3.21.19  3:48 pm   bill I love you please put i'm crazy/it's raining on spotify it's so good

3.21.19  2:54 pm   In your recent videos, when you reference a "you" (ex: "or to be like you" in la de da or "I love you" in I love you) are you talking about an actual person, or is it a general "you" and only used for the purpose of the song? Lmao
3.21.19  1:39 pm   does "might quit" relate to walden, by henry david thoreau intentionally?

3.21.19  1:29 pm   checking out your answers to all the favorite-moment questions leads me to imagine that you like very different things about music than i do, which makes it all the more impressive and positive and remarkable that i realllllly like your music, so. thanks for being so comprehensive about the appeal, i guess. is that intentional?

      do you sometimes reject the use of things you think are good so that more people will like it?
3.21.19  1:26 pm   How did that one guy know about the artifacts page at 3.7.19?
3.21.19  1:24 pm   I realize you're a busy guy, but if you don't answer the question does it mean it's a bad question or you don't have an answer?
3.21.19  1:10 pm   When will the artifacts page become live?

3.21.19  1:02 pm   Favorite John Lennon moment?

this
